plot: This is Now follows the spiritual journey of a young man as he wanders from Portland to Seattle, talking with friends and strangers along the way about the ordinary and extraordinary events which changed their lives.
title: This Is Now
plot_es: This is Now follows the spiritual journey of a young man as he wanders from Portland to Seattle, talking with friends and strangers along the way about the ordinary and extraordinary events which changed their lives.
plot_en: This is Now follows the spiritual journey of a young man as he wanders from Portland to Seattle, talking with friends and strangers along the way about the ordinary and extraordinary events which changed their lives.
